name: Rocket Traveller
description:
Simple platform game in which you control a rocket. 

In level one, you have to reach the planet.

In the second level to the temple.

In the third level to the crystal.

Control:

A - left

D - right

SPACE - boost

-----

The game's controls and lighting are bugged, it may be fixed in the future.

-----

The game was developed during the course:

Video Game Development Using Unity: Code Games with C# | Udemy
